CmdLine: set -ex &&     apk upgrade --update &&     apk add --update libstdc++ curl ca-certificates bash procps vim &&     for pkg in glibc-${GLIBC_VERSION} glibc-bin-${GLIBC_VERSION} glibc-i18n-${GLIBC_VERSION}; do curl -sSL https://github.com/andyshinn/alpine-pkg-glibc/releases/download/${GLIBC_VERSION}/${pkg}.apk -o /tmp/${pkg}.apk; done &&     apk add --allow-untrusted /tmp/*.apk &&     rm -v /tmp/*.apk &&     ( /usr/glibc-compat/bin/localedef --force --inputfile POSIX --charmap UTF-8 C.UTF-8 || true ) &&     echo "export LANG=C.UTF-8" > /etc/profile.d/locale.sh &&     /usr/glibc-compat/sbin/ldconfig /lib /usr/glibc-compat/lib
Commands.Name: run
